endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of real estate agents based on given filters like location and specialization.
Create a new real estate agent profile.
Fetch available properties listed for sale or rent.
Add a new property listing to the service.
Get recommended agents for a specific property based on user preferences and metrics.
Submit a review and rating for a real estate agent by a user.
Retrieve all reviews and ratings for a specific agent.
Update the information of a specific real estate agent.
Remove a property listing from the service.
Submit user feedback regarding the overall service.
